text.en: This is a technical demo developed with the asset available in the Unity Asset Store "Your Remote Assistance"++Develop your own apps and games with this asset.
text.es: Esto es una demo técnica de 6 DOF desarrollado con la herramienta disponible en la Unity Asset Store "Your Remote Assistance"++Dessarrolla tus apps y juegos con esta herramienta.

text.en: Do you want to exit the app?
% Players left to connect. Wait or press button to start game.
text.es: % Jugadores para conectar. Espere o presione el boton para empezar.

text.en: Destroy all the enemies before they escape
text.es: Destruye todos los enemigos antes de que escapen.

text.en: You should at least select one item
text.es: Debes seleccionar por lo menos 1 item

text.en: Numbers of participants who are going to join the service
text.es: Numero de participantes que van a participar

text.en: Only 1 to 4 participants are allowed to be in the game
text.es: Solo esta permitido un numero de 1 a 4 participantes

text.en: Write down the name of the room you want to create
text.es: Escribe el nombre de la sala que quieres crear

text.en: You should write a name of the room with at least 5 characters
text.es: Debes escribir un nombre de sala con la menos 5 caracteres

text.en: In order of establish connection you will have to connect by Facebook
text.es: Para poder establecer la conexión tendrás que conectarte por Facebook
Connectando con Facebook. Por favor, espere...

text.en: Now connecting to server. Please, wait...
text.es: Ahora conectando con servidor. Por favor, espere...

text.en: There was an error on Facebook connection
text.es: Hubo un error en la conexion a Facebook

text.en: Invite a friend to new service
text.es: Invitar a un amigo a nuevo servicio

text.en: Accept an invitation from a friend
text.es: Aceptar una invitación de un amigo

text.en: Select the friends you want to invite
Select the invitation you want to accept
text.es: Elige la invitacion que deseas aceptar

text.en: Write the scene to load next in the build settings
text.es: Write the scene to load next in the build settings

text.en: You can play locally or remotely.++Local is based on UNET, remote is based on Sockets.
text.es: You can play locally or remotely.++Local is based on UNET, remote is based on Sockets.

text.en: You can organize games with 2 options:++With social networks or with the game lobby
text.es: You can organize games with 2 options:++With social networks or with the game lobby

text.en: No matter what connection are you in, all the behaviours are the same in UNET and Sockets
text.es: No matter what connection are you in, all the behaviours are the same in UNET and Sockets

text.en: Do you want to call the phone number % ?
text.es: Deseas llamar al número de telefono % ?

text.en: Set up your Bitcoin Wallet in order to run payments
text.es: Establezca el monedero Bitcoin para ejecutar pagos

text.en: Press here to set up the wallet
text.es: Pulse aquí para establecer el monedero

text.en: You need a Bitcoin Wallet in order to be able to perform this operation
text.es: Necesita de un monedero para poder efectuar esta operacion

text.en: Select the wallet to receive the payment:
text.es: Elige la cartera para recibir el pago:

text.en: If you proceed to change the network it will be necessary to restart the app in order to connect with the desired network.++Do you really want to change the network?
text.es: Si usted procede a cambiar la red será necesareo reiniciar la aplicación para poderse conectar con la red deseada.++Desea proceder con el cambio de red?

text.en: Do you want to level up and unlock the access to the Main Bitcoin Network?
text.es: Desea subir de nivel y desbloquear el acceso a la red principal de Bitcoin?

text.en: Main Bitcoin Network Unlocked Succesfully!!++Now you can switch to Main Bitcoin Network!!
text.es: Red Bitcoin Principal Desbloqueada Exitosamente!!++Ahora puede usted cambiar a la red Bitcoin Principal!!

text.en: Failed to unlock Main Bitcoin Network
text.es: Fracaso en desbloqueo de la red Bitcoin principal

text.en: You can close the application now
Practise with this wallet as much time as you want with FREE Test Bitcoins in the Test Network for FREE
text.es: Practica con esta cartera tanto tiempo como desee con Bitcoins de test Gratuitos en la red de testeo gratuita

text.en: The Test Network is a network the developers are using to develop Bitcoins based applications without spending any real cash
text.es: La red de testeo es una red que utilizan los desarrolladores de applicaciones Bitcoin sin necesidad de gastar dinero

text.en: Once you get used the way Bitcoin works you can switch to the Main Bitcoin Network to work with real cash
text.es: Una vez este acostumbrado a la forma de trabajar de Bitcoin usted puede cambiar a la red principal de Bitcoin con dinero real

text.en: It also allows ways to move your Bitcoins from cryptocurrency to other currencies like PayPal easily
text.es: It also allows ways to move your Bitcoins from cryptocurrency to other currencies like PayPal easily

text.en: You will find the asset in Unity Asset Store in which this application is based so you can develop easily and add Bitcoins to your business
text.es: Encontrará el asset en la Unity Asset Store en el cual esta basado esta aplicación para que usted pueda integrar Bitcoins en su negocio

text.en: If you press confirm button we will call your email program, so you can send your private key so you can use it in other wallets.++ Remember that the private key should never be shared!!!
text.es: If you press confirm button we will call your email program, so you can send your private key so you can use it in other wallets.++ Remember that the private key should never be shared!!!

text.en: Name your account as you want to be able to easily identify it.
text.es: Nombra tu cuenta como desees para que sea facilmente identificable.

text.en: You have to write here your private key address.++ Now we are going to open the video tutorial to show you how in:++ http://www.youtube.com
text.es: Tiene que escribir su dirección de llave privada aquí.++Ahora vamos a abrir el video tutorial para enseñarle como es:++ http://www.youtube.com

text.en: Write here your private wallet key
text.es: Escribe aqui el numero privado de tu cartera

text.en: You have to write you secret key address in order to receive money and pay. This information is not transmitted over Internet and it's saved locally with a high level encryption algorithm.
text.es: Debes escribir tu llave privada para poder recibir y pagar. Esta información no es transmitida por la red y se guarda localmente con un alto nivel de encryptación.

text.en: The key introduced doesn't belong to a valid Bitcoin address
text.es: La llave introducida no pertenece a una direccion de Bitcoin

text.en: The key has not been updated
text.es: La llave no ha sido actualizada

text.en: You didn't set up your Bitcoin key address. Do you want to set it up now?
text.es: No has definido tu direccion de Bitcoin. Quieres definirla ahora?
Tablas de cambio actualizadas cada 15 minutos

text.en: You only delete the local data. It's not removed from the network. Just remember your private key.++Do you really want to delete this wallet?
text.es: Solo eliminas los datos locales. No se elimina de la red. Acuerdate de tu llave privada++Deseas realmente eliminar esta cartera?

text.en: This is the public address you have to share in order to receive payments.
text.es: Esta es la dirección pública que debes compartir para recibir pagos.

text.en: Copy and paste the public key address to add/withdraw funds
text.es: Copia y pega la dirección pública para añadir/retirar fondos

text.en: Do you want to save this address?

text.es: Conectando a la red Blockchain.++Por favor, espere...

text.en: Frame the camera with its focus in the QR Code
text.es: Encuadra la camara enfocando al codigo QR

text.en: Enter the email address to send:

text.es: No ha escrito la direccion de correo

text.en: Please, consider to make a transfer to this address
text.es: Por favor, considere hacer una transferencia a esta dirección

text.en: Attached to this email there is a QR Code image with the public address to receive transfers
text.es: Adjunto a este correo hay un codigo QR con la dirección public para recibir transferencias

text.en: Now we are going to open a browser were you will be able to find your wallet with funds.++Copy and paste your public key address.
text.es: Ahora vamos a abrir una pagina del navegador donde podremos rellenar tu cartera con fondos++Copy y pega tu dirección pública.

text.en: On the opened URL you can convert from Bitcoin to Paypal.++In the future, it should be possible to do it from inside this same application, just by setting up your PayPal email address.
text.es: On the opened URL you can convert from Bitcoin to Paypal.++In the future, it should be possible to do it from inside this same application, just by setting up your PayPal email address.

text.en: Since you have the code you can do it by yourself.++You can be the first to make the most accessible way to earn Bitcoins with digital work and exchange it to PayPal easily
text.es: Since you have the code you can do it by yourself.++You can be the first to make the most accessible way to earn Bitcoins with digital work and exchange it to PayPal easily

text.en: Since you are right now on the Test Network you can't exchange Bitcoin of this Test Network for real money because these Bitcoins are just for testing.
text.es: Since you are right now on the Test Network you can't exchange Bitcoin of this Test Network for real money because these Bitcoins are just for testing.

text.en: The transaction has been done succesfully!!++It can take some time until the balance is updated.++Please, be patience.
text.es: La transaccion ha sido realizada existosamente!!++Puede llevar algo de tiempo para que el balance se actualize++Espere, por favor.

text.en: The transaction has failed to be done
text.es: La transaccion ha fallado en ejecutarse

text.en: Not enough funds to perform the transaction.++Current Balance= %++Amount of transfer= %
text.es: No hay fondos suficientes para ejecutar la transaccion.++Balance Actual= %++Cantidad Transferencia= %

text.en: There is no valid address to send
text.es: No hay una direccion valida para enviar

text.en: Enter the label you want to use to save the address.
text.es: Introduce la etiqueta que deaseas usar para guardar la dirección.

text.en: This is not a valid address.++ You should write here the public address.
text.es: Esta no es una direccion valida++ Debe escribir aqui la dirección pública.

text.en: Operation failed to be executed++ It is possible that the amount of the miners' fee is too low to be accepted.
text.es: Fallo en la ejecución de la operación++ Es posible que la cantidad de pago a los mineros sea insuficiente.

text.en: If the miners' fee is below 20 cents of USD it's possible that the network is not going to accept the transaction.++ Still, do you want to proceed?
text.es: Si la tasa a los mineros es menor de 20 centavos de USD es posible que la red no accepte la transacción++ Desea continuar de todas formas?

text.en: The amount is below 1 USD. Are you sure you want to run this transaction?
text.es: La cantidad es menor a 1 Dollar. Esta seguro que desea continuar con esta transacción?

text.en: The amount of the transfer should not be zero.
text.es: La cantidad de la transferencia no debe ser zero.

text.en: Select or add an existing the wallet
text.es: Elige o añade una cartera existente

text.en: Select the wallet you want to use to pay
text.es: Elige la cartera que deseas utilizar para pagar

text.en: You have received a payment of % with the transaction ID %
text.es: Ha recibido un pago de % con el identificador de transacsaccion %

text.en: Practise with this wallet as much time as you want with FREE Test Ethereum in the Test Network for FREE
text.es: Practica con esta cartera tanto tiempo como desee con Ethereum de test Gratuitos en la red de testeo gratuita

text.en: The Test Network is a network the developers are using to develop Ethereum based applications without spending any real cash
text.es: La red de testeo es una red que utilizan los desarrolladores de applicaciones Ethereum sin necesidad de gastar dinero

text.en: Once you get used the way Ethereum works you can switch to the Main Ethereum Network to work with real cash
text.es: Una vez este acostumbrado a la forma de trabajar de Ethereum usted puede cambiar a la red principal de Ethereum con dinero real

text.en: It also allows ways to move your Ethereum from cryptocurrency to other currencies like PayPal easily
text.es: It also allows ways to move your Ethereum from cryptocurrency to other currencies like PayPal easily

text.en: You will find the asset in Unity Asset Store in which this application is based so you can develop easily and add Ethereum to your business
text.es: Encontrará el asset en la Unity Asset Store en el cual esta basado esta aplicación para que usted pueda integrar Ethereum en su negocio

text.en: Do you want to save this address?
If you press confirm button we will call your email program, so you can send your private key so you can use it in other wallets.++ Remember that the private key should never be shared!!!
text.es: If you press confirm button we will call your email program, so you can send your private key so you can use it in other wallets.++ Remember that the private key should never be shared!!!

text.es: Nombra tu cuenta como desees para que sea facilmente identificable.

text.es: Tiene que escribir su dirección de llave privada aquí.++Ahora vamos a abrir el video tutorial para enseñarle como es:++ http://www.youtube.com

text.en: Write here your private wallet key
text.es: Escribe aqui el numero privado de tu cartera

text.en: You only delete the local data. It's not removed from the network. Just remember your private key.++Do you really want to delete this wallet?
text.es: Solo eliminas los datos locales. No se elimina de la red. Acuerdate de tu llave privada++Deseas realmente eliminar esta cartera?

text.en: This is the public address you have to share in order to receive payments.
text.es: Esta es la dirección pública que debes compartir para recibir pagos.

text.en: Copy and paste the public key address to add/withdraw funds
text.es: Copia y pega la dirección pública para añadir/retirar fondos

text.en: Please, consider to make a transfer to this address
text.es: Por favor, considere hacer una transferencia a esta dirección

text.en: Attached to this email there is a QR Code image with the public address to receive transfers
text.es: Adjunto a este correo hay un codigo QR con la dirección public para recibir transferencias

text.en: Now we are going to open a browser were you will be able to find your wallet with funds.++Copy and paste your public key address.
text.es: Ahora vamos a abrir una pagina del navegador donde podremos rellenar tu cartera con fondos++Copy y pega tu dirección pública.

text.en: On the opened URL you can convert from Ethereum to Paypal.++In the future, it should be possible to do it from inside this same application, just by setting up your PayPal email address.
text.es: On the opened URL you can convert from Ethereum to Paypal.++In the future, it should be possible to do it from inside this same application, just by setting up your PayPal email address.

text.en: Since you have the code you can do it by yourself.++You can be the first to make the most accessible way to earn Ethereum with digital work and exchange it to PayPal easily
text.es: Since you have the code you can do it by yourself.++You can be the first to make the most accessible way to earn Ethereum with digital work and exchange it to PayPal easily

text.en: Since you are right now on the Test Network you can't exchange Ethereum of this Test Network for real money because these Ethereum are just for testing.
text.es: Since you are right now on the Test Network you can't exchange Ethereum of this Test Network for real money because these Ethereum are just for testing.

text.en: The transaction has been done succesfully!!++It can take some time until the balance is updated.++Please, be patience.
text.es: La transaccion ha sido realizada existosamente!!++Puede llevar algo de tiempo para que el balance se actualize++Espere, por favor.

text.en: The transaction has failed to be done
text.es: La transaccion ha fallado en ejecutarse

text.en: Not enough funds to perform the transaction.++Current Balance= %++Amount of transfer= %
text.es: No hay fondos suficientes para ejecutar la transaccion.++Balance Actual= %++Cantidad Transferencia= %

text.en: There is no valid address to send
text.es: No hay una direccion valida para enviar

text.en: This is not a valid address.++ You should write here the public address.
text.es: Esta no es una direccion valida++ Debe escribir aqui la dirección pública.

text.en: If the miners' fee is below 20 cents of USD it's possible that the network is not going to accept the transaction.++ Still, do you want to proceed?
text.es: Si la tasa a los mineros es menor de 20 centavos de USD es posible que la red no accepte la transacción++ Desea continuar de todas formas?

text.en: The amount is below 1 USD. Are you sure you want to run this transaction?
text.es: La cantidad es menor a 1 Dollar. Esta seguro que desea continuar con esta transacción?

text.es: La cantidad de la transferencia no debe ser zero.

text.en: Select in order the data and documents you want to sign
text.es: Elija en orden los datos y documentos que desee firmar

text.en: Select in order the data and documents you want to verify authenticity
text.es: Elija en orden los datos y documentos que desee verificar su autenticidad

text.en: Add new data or document to sign
text.es: Añadir nuevos datos o documento a firmar

text.en: Write the text you want to sign
text.es: Escribe el texto que quieres firmar
Aqui esta tu firma sobre los datos

text.en: No data or documents to sign
text.es: No hay datos o documentos para firmar

text.en: The document's names signed and stored
text.es: Los nombres de los documentos firmados y guardados

text.en: The contract id for the signed documents
text.es: El id del contrato para los documentos firmados
